result.arabic_text: وَإِذَآ أُلۡقُواْ مِنۡهَا مَكَانٗا ضَيِّقٗا مُّقَرَّنِينَ دَعَوۡاْ هُنَالِكَ ثُبُورٗا
result.translation: Na watakapo tupwa humo mahali dhiki, hali wamefungwa, wataombawafe.
result.footnotes: Na watapo tupwa katika pahali pembamba kwa kulingana na unene wao, nao wamefungwa pingu mikono yao kwenye shingo zao, watapiga kelele kuhimiza wateketezwe upesi upesi ili wapate kupumzika na kitisho cha adhabu.
